sub_title: Managing Director & owner, Skybrokers New & Used Satellite Equipment broker
summary: Experienced Managing Director with a demonstrated history of working in the telecommunications industry. Skilled in Management, Satellite, Software Installation, Network Design, and Internet Protocol (IP). Strong business development professional with a Ing focused in Logistics Management, Physical Distribution, Logistics Engineering from NHTV Internationale Hogeschool Breda.
